titleStmt.title: Ane breif gathering of the halie signes, sacrifices and sacramentis institutit of God sen the creation of the warlde. And of the trew originall of the sacrifice of the messe. Translatit out of Frenche into Scottis be ane faithful brother
Sommaire recueil des signes sacrez. English.
titleStmt.author: Stewart, William, d. 1569.
Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Stewart, from "Sommaire recueil des signes sacrez", 1561, which is erroneously attributed to Theodore de Bèze.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
